title: Alternative exposure source
change_from_mainline: Alternative exposure definition: require medication start within baseline window (vs overlap/ongoing at ICU admission)

title: Exclude early bleed evidence
change_from_mainline: Exclude stays with PRBC transfusion evidence during baseline window (proxy for early bleeding); UGIB-pre-index not available in MIMIC diagnoses table

title: Negative-control time window
change_from_mainline: Evaluate early window where causal effect implausible

title: SUP indication driver subgroup
change_from_mainline: Stratify by MV vs coagulopathy indication driver (strata runs under output/multicohort_run/sensitivity/G1_SUBGROUP_SUP_DRIVER/levels/)

title: Liver disease subgroup
change_from_mainline: Stratify by baseline liver disease (strata runs under output/multicohort_run/sensitivity/G2_SUBGROUP_LIVER_DX/levels/)

title: Antithrombotic exposure subgroup
change_from_mainline: Stratify by baseline antithrombotic exposure (strata runs under output/multicohort_run/sensitivity/G3_SUBGROUP_ANTITHROMBOTIC/levels/)
